thread.title: Why now is the perfect time to go to Paris
thread.title_full: Why now is the perfect time to go to Paris

author: Stanley Stewart
title: Why now is the perfect time to go to Paris
text: Paris and around Why now is the perfect time to go to Paris Autumn is the loveliest season to visit Paris, says Stanley Stewart, when the city is strangely charged with romance and emotion "Every street in Paris seems to echo with the ghosts of love stories. It is not that Paris has more love stories than anywhere else but that the city seems to make more of them, that they become part of its currency, a reference point for us all" Photo: AP/FOTOLIA By Stanley Stewart
